info.headline: Blizzard Warning issued December 23 at 2:41PM MST until December 25 at 12:00PM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...BLIZZARD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM SATURDAY TO NOON MST SUNDAY... ...WIND CHILL WARNING WILL EXPIRE AT 3 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Ground blizzard conditions expected. Total snow accumulations up to 6 inches. Winds gusting as high as 70 mph. * WHERE...The Continental Divide along the Rocky Mountain Front. * WHEN...From 6 AM Saturday to Noon MST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Widespread blowing snow will significantly reduce visibility. Very strong winds could cause extensive damage to trees and power lines.
info.instruction: Travel should be restricted to emergencies only. If you must travel, have a winter survival kit with you. If you get stranded, stay with your vehicle. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or visiting the MDT Road Report website.
